https://tmrev.io/movie/30651-Bunuel and King Solomon's Table 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nwoy1KLZ4MFzzJhCOfa2auJqAph.jpg The old Spanish filmmaker Luis Buñuel (1900-83) imagines a movie plot, set in Toledo in the future 2002, about the fantastic adventure of three actors, who play him and his friends, the painter Salvador Dalí (1904-89) and the poet Federico García Lorca (1898-1936), and their search for King Solomon's table, a mythical artifact capable of revealing the past, present and future. Bunuel and King Solomon's Table
